00044 // 
00045 // Sprite::Sprite - Chapter 10, page 315
00046 //
00047 Sprite::Sprite()
00048 {
00049         m_d3dSprite = NULL;
00050         m_Position = m_Hotspot = CPoint(0,0);
00051         m_Width = m_Height = 0;
00052         m_TextureWidth = m_TextureHeight = 0;
00053         m_CurrentFrame = m_NumFrames = 0;
00054         m_HasColorKey = true;
00055 
00056         m_IsPaused = true;
00057         m_LoopingAnim = false;;
00058         m_ElapsedTime = 0;
00059         m_MSPerFrame = 1000 / 15;                               // this should never be zero
00060         m_IsVisible = true;
00061         m_pTexture = NULL;
00062         m_ZOrder = ZORDER_LAYER2;
00063 };
00064 
00065 // 
00066 // Sprite::VOnRestore - Chapter 10, page 315
00067 //
00068 HRESULT Sprite::VOnRestore()
00069 {
00070         SAFE_RELEASE(m_d3dSprite);
00071         return (D3DXCreateSprite(DXUTGetD3DDevice(), &m_d3dSprite)==S_OK);
00072 }
00073 
00074 // 
00075 // Sprite::VOnRestore - Chapter 10, page 319
00076 //
00077 HRESULT Sprite::VOnRender(double fTime, float fElapsedTime)
00078 {
00079         CPoint actualPos( m_Position - m_Hotspot );
00080         CRect sourceRect( CPoint(0,0), CPoint(m_Width-1, m_Height-1 ) );
00081 
00082         // Adjust for the frame
00083         sourceRect.top += ( m_CurrentFrame * m_TextureHeight );
00084         sourceRect.bottom += ( m_CurrentFrame * m_TextureHeight );
00085 
00086         Vec3 center(1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00087         Vec3 translation(actualPos.x, actualPos.y, 0.0f);
00088 
00089         if (m_d3dSprite && m_pTexture)
00090         {
00091                 m_d3dSprite->Begin(D3DXSPRITE_ALPHABLEND);
00092                 m_d3dSprite->Draw(m_pTexture, &sourceRect, &center, &translation, g_White);
00093                 m_d3dSprite->End();
00094         }
00095 
00096         return S_OK;
00097 }

00099 // 
00100 // Sprite::VOnRestore - Chapter 10, page 321
00101 //
00102 void Sprite::VOnUpdate(int deltaMS)
00103 {
00104         if (m_IsPaused)
00105         {
00106                 return; 
00107         }
00108 
00109         m_ElapsedTime += deltaMS;
00110 
00111         // Only call SetFrame() if we have to.
00112         // We're guaranteed to have to advance at least one frame...
00113 
00114         if (m_ElapsedTime >= m_MSPerFrame)
00115         {
00116                 DWORD const numFramesToAdvance = (m_ElapsedTime / m_MSPerFrame);
00117 
00118                 m_ElapsedTime -= (numFramesToAdvance * m_MSPerFrame);
00119 
00120                 int desiredFrame = GetFrame() + numFramesToAdvance;
00121 
00122                 //Check if we're looping...
00123                 if ((false==m_LoopingAnim) && (desiredFrame >= GetFrameCount()))
00124                 {
00125                         desiredFrame = GetFrameCount() - 1;     //Stay on last frame...
00126                 }
00127                 
00128                 //Now advance our frame properly...
00129                 SetFrame(desiredFrame);         
00130         }
00131 }

00135 // 
00136 // BitmapSprite::BitmapSprite - Chapter 10, page 322
00137 //
00138 BitmapSprite::BitmapSprite(const std::string fileName, bool inCache, const int frames)
00139 {
00140         m_fileName = fileName;
00141         m_NumFrames = frames;
00142         m_bInCache = inCache;
00143 }
00144 
00145 // 
00146 // BitmapSprite::VOnRestore - Chapter 10, page 322
00147 //
00148 HRESULT BitmapSprite::VOnRestore()
00149 {
00150         if (FAILED (Sprite::VOnRestore() ) )
00151         {
00152                 return E_FAIL;
00153         }
00154 
00155         SAFE_RELEASE(m_pTexture);
00156 
00157     D3DXIMAGE_INFO imageInfo;
00158         ZeroMemory(&imageInfo, sizeof(D3DXIMAGE_INFO));
00159 
00160         if (m_bInCache)
00161         {
00162                 Resource resource(m_fileName.c_str());
00163                 int size = g_pApp->m_ResCache->Create(resource);
00164                 assert(size);
00165                 char *textureBuffer = (char *)g_pApp->m_ResCache->Get(resource);
00166                 if ( FAILED ( D3DXCreateTextureFromFileInMemoryEx( 
00167                         DXUTGetD3DDevice(), // device
00168                         textureBuffer,          // source data
00169                         resource.m_size,        // source data size
00170                         D3DX_DEFAULT,           // width - get it from the file
00171                         D3DX_DEFAULT,           // height - get it from the file
00172                         D3DX_DEFAULT,           // miplevels - get it from the file
00173                         0,                                      // useage - default (not a render target or dynamic)
00174                         D3DFMT_UNKNOWN,         // format - get it from the file
00175                         D3DPOOL_DEFAULT,        // pool - use default
00176                         D3DX_FILTER_NONE,       // filter - don't use any filter
00177                         D3DX_DEFAULT,           // mip filter - use default
00178                         g_Transparent,          // color key - use our transparent color
00179                         &imageInfo,                     // grab the source info
00180                         NULL,                           // palleteindex - we don't need it
00181                         &m_pTexture ) ) )       // the texture pointer
00182                         return false;
00183         }
00184         else
00185         {
00186                 if ( FAILED ( D3DXCreateTextureFromFileExA ( 
00187                         DXUTGetD3DDevice(), 
00188                         m_fileName.c_str(),     // source file name
00189                         D3DX_DEFAULT,           // width - get it from the file
00190                         D3DX_DEFAULT,           // height - get it from the file
00191                         D3DX_DEFAULT,           // miplevels - get it from the file
00192                         0,                                      // useage - default (not a render target or dynamic)
00193                         D3DFMT_UNKNOWN,         // format - get it from the file
00194                         D3DPOOL_DEFAULT,        // pool - use default
00195                         D3DX_FILTER_NONE,       // filter - don't use any filter
00196                         D3DX_DEFAULT,           // mip filter - use default
00197                         g_Transparent,          // color key - use our transparent color
00198                         &imageInfo,                     // grab the source info
00199                         NULL,                           // palleteindex - we don't need it
00200                         &m_pTexture ) ) )       // the texture pointer
00201                         return false;
00202         }
00203 
00204         m_TextureWidth = m_Width = imageInfo.Width;
00205         m_TextureHeight = m_Height = imageInfo.Height / m_NumFrames;
00206         assert(m_Height * m_NumFrames == imageInfo.Height && _T("Sprite height error"));
00207 
00208         return true;
00209 }

00214 TextSprite::TextSprite(
00215         std::wstring text,                      // the text to draw
00216         TextStyle style,                        // the style of the text
00217         const bool isCentered,          // justification
00218         const CPoint &position,         // position of this sprite on the parent surface
00219         optional<CPoint> size           // a static surface size, or size to fit if size is invalid
00220 ) : m_style(style)
00221 {
00222         m_text = text;
00223         m_isCentered = isCentered;
00224 
00225         m_size.clear();
00226         m_size = size;
00227 
00228         m_Position = position;
00229         m_NumFrames = 1;
00230 };

00233 
00234 HRESULT TextSprite::VOnRestore()
00235 {
00236         // Two situations:
00237         // 1) String should be broken into a multiline entity to fit into a specific area
00238         // 2) String sent it need should take up as much space H&V that it needs
00239 
00240         // Set the width and height
00241         CSize sizeText;
00242         CSize sizeTotal;
00243 
00244         std::wstring multiline;
00245 
00246         if ( m_size.valid() )
00247         {
00248                 // This is the total to fit into        
00249                 sizeTotal = *m_size;
00250 
00251                 // Fit the original text inside the bounds
00252                 multiline = g_pApp->GetFontHandler()->ParseMessage( m_text, m_style, sizeTotal);
00253                 sizeText = g_pApp->GetFontHandler()->GetStringSize(multiline, m_style);
00254         }
00255         else
00256         {
00257                 // Set the width and height
00258                 sizeText = g_pApp->GetFontHandler()->GetStringSize(m_text, m_style);
00259         sizeTotal = sizeText;
00260 
00261                 multiline = m_text;
00262         }
00263 
00264         int numLines = CountLines(multiline);
00265 
00266         assert(sizeTotal.cx > 0 && sizeTotal.cy > 0 && "About to create sprite with no width or height, is this what you want?");
00267 
00268         m_TextureWidth = m_Width = sizeTotal.cx;
00269         m_TextureHeight = m_Height = sizeTotal.cy;
00270         
00271         UINT texW = static_cast<UINT>(m_TextureWidth);
00272         UINT texH = static_cast<UINT>(m_TextureHeight);
00273         UINT numMipLevels = D3DX_DEFAULT;
00274         D3DFORMAT format = D3DFMT_UNKNOWN;
00275         
00276         // This call will reset width, height, and miplevels to the 
00277         // correct values.
00278         if (FAILED (D3DXCheckTextureRequirements(
00279                 DXUTGetD3DDevice(), 
00280                 &texW,
00281                 &texH,
00282                 &numMipLevels,
00283                 0,
00284                 &format,
00285                 D3DPOOL_DEFAULT ) ) )
00286         {
00287                 return false;
00288         }
00289 
00290         // Create the texture
00291         if ( FAILED ( DXUTGetD3DDevice()->CreateTexture(
00292                 texW,           // width 
00293                 texH,   // height 
00294                 numMipLevels,           // miplevels - use default
00295                 0,                                      // useage - default (not a render target or dynamic)
00296                 format,                         // format - unknown format
00297                 D3DPOOL_DEFAULT,        // pool - use default
00298                 &m_pTexture,            // the texture pointer
00299                 NULL ) ) )
00300         {
00301                 return false;
00302         }
00303 
00304         m_TextureWidth = texW;
00305         m_TextureHeight = texH;
00306 
00307         // Reinitialize the utility string to count the line breaks
00308         std::wstring utilString = multiline;
00309 
00310         // Size of border
00311         CSize sizeBorder( sizeTotal - sizeText );
00312 
00313         int initialX = sizeBorder.cx / 2;
00314         int initialY = sizeBorder.cy / 2;
00315         int deltaY = sizeText.cy / numLines;
00316         
00317         if (m_isCentered)
00318         {       
00319                 // Determine how the lines will be spaced vertically
00320                 std::wstring firstLine;
00321                 RemoveFirstLine(utilString, firstLine);
00322                 CSize const firstLineSize = g_pApp->GetFontHandler()->GetStringSize( firstLine, m_style );
00323                 CSize printArea = sizeTotal - sizeBorder;
00324                 bool const fitsVertically = printArea.cy >= firstLineSize.cy * numLines;
00325 
00326                 if (fitsVertically)
00327                 {       // Enough room, place lines in the center of the print area
00328                         initialY += (printArea.cy - firstLineSize.cy * numLines) / 2;
00329                         deltaY = firstLineSize.cy;
00330                 }
00331                 else
00332                 {       // Not enough room, squeeze lines on top of each other
00333                         deltaY = printArea.cy / numLines;
00334                         initialY += (deltaY - firstLineSize.cy) / 2;
00335                 }
00336         }
00337         else
00338         {
00339                 deltaY = g_pApp->GetFontHandler()->GetHeight( m_style );
00340         }
00341 
00342         //Draw each line one at a time
00343         for(int i=0; i<numLines; ++i)
00344         {
00345                 std::wstring line;
00346                 RemoveFirstLine(multiline, line);
00347                 
00348                 int x = initialX;
00349                 int y = initialY + i * deltaY;
00350 
00351                 if (line.length())
00352                 {
00353                         if ( m_isCentered )
00354                         {
00355                                 CSize sizeText = g_pApp->GetFontHandler()->GetStringSize( line, m_style );
00356                                 x = x + ( sizeTotal.cx - sizeBorder.cx - sizeText.cx ) / 2;
00357                         }
00358 
00359                         if(FAILED(g_pApp->GetFontHandler()->DrawText( this, line, m_style, CPoint( x, y ) ) ) )
00360                                 return false;
00361                 }
00362         }
00363 
00364     return true;
00365 }

00367 
00368 HRESULT TextSprite::VOnRender(double fTime, float fElapsedTime)
00369 {
00370         CPoint actualPos( m_Position - m_Hotspot );
00371         CRect sourceRect( CPoint(0,0), CPoint(m_Width-1, m_Height-1 ) );
00372 
00373         // Adjust for the frame
00374         sourceRect.top += ( m_CurrentFrame * m_TextureHeight );
00375         sourceRect.bottom += ( m_CurrentFrame * m_TextureHeight );
00376 
00377         Vec3 center(1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00378         Vec3 translation(actualPos.x, actualPos.y, 0.0f);
00379 
00380         if (m_d3dSprite && m_pTexture)
00381         {
00382                 m_d3dSprite->Begin(D3DXSPRITE_ALPHABLEND);
00383                 VOnRestore();
00384                 m_d3dSprite->End();
00385         }
00386 
00387         return S_OK;
00388 }
00389 
00390 void TextSprite::SetText(const std::wstring text)
00391 {
00392         if (text != m_text)
00393         {
00394                 m_text = text;
00395                 VOnRestore();
00396         }
00397 }
